RankDef.description: Entry-level member of the Morag Tong, newly initiated into the organization.
A devoted but unquestioning servant of the Morag Tong, acting on orders without hesitation.
A low-ranking member tasked with supporting Morag Tong operations.
An experienced Thrall who has earned recognition for their loyalty and skill.
A strategist and planner, contributing insight to the Morag Tong's operations.
A trusted and proven agent of the Morag Tong, regarded as family within the organization.
A member with privileged knowledge of the Morag Tongâ€™s secrets and inner workings.
A senior figure within the Morag Tong, commanding respect and authority.
A highly revered Master, honored for exceptional service and leadership.
The supreme leader of the Morag Tong, holding ultimate authority over all members.
